title: "Artificial intelligence identifies severe aortic stenosis from routine echocardiograms"
excerpt: "A novel artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm uses routine echocardiograms to identify aortic stenosis patients at high risk of death who could benefit from treatment. The late breaking research was presented in a Hot Line session on 28 August at ESC Congress 2022."
